title: Civic Art Collection
description: A. SUMMARY This data set includes all of the publicly-sited works in the Civic Art Collection, which includes historic monuments, murals, and artworks commissioned through the City's Public Art Program. The data set includes the following categories: artist name, title of work, medium, dimensions and location. The location also includes the Cultural Districts and Supervisor District that an artwork resides in. B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED Dataset is exported manually by staff from internal collections database and re-formatted manually by staff. C. UPDATE PROCESS Dataset is updated as needed manually by staff. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET Artworks may be located at a specific addresses (traditional building number, street name format) or other locations (City Parks, Piers, SFO, etc.) that don't meet the traditional address format; in these cases, the closest intersection or building address has been used. Please look at the "Location Description" field for the location of the artwork (floor 2, International terminal, Northwest corner, etc.). An individual artwork can consist of a single piece or multiple pieces, this will be reflected in the last part of it's accession number with either a letter or number (i.e. 1904.2.a-b or 1999.22.1-2). A single artwork may have multiple entries, one for each part, or may have a single group entry. Therefore, the number of entries is not equivalent to the number of artworks. Generally, if an artworks' pieces are spread out over a distance, each piece will have an entry and if they are grouped at one location, there will be one group entry. When an artwork spans multiple blocks one end point was chosen for the address/map point. The data column "number_of_districts" refers to how many Cultural Districts a mural is in. If a mural is in more than Cultural Districts, the districts will be listed in the "Cultural_District" column and separated by a semicolon. This is because cultural districts can overlap.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: Date Artwork was created

columns.name: accession_number
columns.description: SFAC tracking number

columns.name: artist
columns.description: Artwork Creator

columns.name: credit_line
columns.description: Credit Line of artwork

columns.name: display_title
columns.description: Title of Artwork

columns.name: display_dimensions
columns.description: Overall Dimensions of Artwork

columns.name: medium
columns.description: Medium/materials of artwork

columns.name: media_support
columns.description: Medium/materials of artwork

columns.name: facility
columns.description: Building Artwork is located in or near

columns.name: current_location
columns.description: Location type; Public Display, City Agency, SFO, etc.

columns.name: location_description
columns.description: Description of the exact location of the artwork (floor, wing, side of park, etc.)

columns.name: street_address_or_intersection
columns.description: Street address or closest street address or intersection to artwork location

columns.name: zip_code
columns.description: Zip Code of artwork location

columns.name: number_of_districts
columns.description: The number of Cultural Districts a single artwork is in

columns.name: cultural_districts
columns.description: The cultural district(s) an artwork is in

columns.name: supervisor_district
columns.description: The Supervisor District which an artwork is in.

columns.name: analysis_neighborhood
columns.description: The Analysis Neighborhood which an artwork is in.

columns.name: the_geom
columns.description: Point containing latitude and longitude for the artwork.

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp the data was updated in the source system.

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp the data was loaded to the open data portal.

columns.name: Current Supervisor Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Supervisor Districts' (26cr-cadq) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Analysis Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Analysis Neighborhoods' (ajp5-b2md) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Neighborhoods' (jwn9-ihcz) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: SF Find Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'SF Find Neighborhoods' (6qbp-sg9q) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Police Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Police Districts' (qgnn-b9vv) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
